name: iPhone 16 Pro Max
description: Experience the pinnacle of innovation with the iPhone 16 Pro Max, Apple's most advanced smartphone yet. Crafted with aerospace-grade titanium and featuring a stunning 6.9-inch Super Retina XDR display, the iPhone 16 Pro Max delivers unmatched clarity, brightness, and true-to-life colours in every frame. Powered by the cutting-edge A18 Pro chip, this device redefines performance and efficiency, making multitasking, mobile gaming, and video editing smoother than ever. The iPhone 16 Pro Max also introduces Apple's next-gen ProCamera system, combining a 48MP main sensor with Ultra Wide and Telephoto lenses—perfect for everything from low-light portraits to professional-grade 8K video recording. With up to 33 hours of battery life, 1TB of storage, Wi-Fi 7, and iOS 18, this phone is built to keep up with the future. Whether you're a content creator, tech enthusiast, or casual user, the iPhone 16 Pro Max is designed to elevate your experience in every way.

name: Samsung Galaxy A55 5G
description: The Samsung Galaxy A55 5G combines sleek design with solid performance for everyday users. Featuring a vibrant 6.6-inch Super AMOLED display, 8GB of RAM, and a powerful Exynos chipset, it’s built to handle multitasking, media consumption, and social media like a champ. With support for 5G, you’ll enjoy fast downloads and smoother streaming on the go.

name: Samsung Galaxy S23 FE 5G
description: The Galaxy S23 FE is a fan-favorite flagship with premium features at a more accessible price. It comes equipped with a flagship-grade Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 processor, a stunning AMOLED 120Hz display, and a triple camera system designed for quality photography day and night.

name: Xiaomi Redmi Note 13 Pro 5G
description: A budget-friendly beast, the Redmi Note 13 Pro 5G features a smooth 120Hz AMOLED display, a powerful Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 processor, and a 200MP main camera for sharp and detailed shots. It’s perfect for users who want flagship-like features without the hefty price.
